name: Xerox Remastered
description:
During GMTK I made a game in 48h that I was fairly pleased with (https://qer24.itch.io/xerox), so i decided to work on it for 2 more weeks to polish the movement, mechanics and make new levels.

Xerox is a futuristic platformer where you can dash once per level and also - make a checkpoint once per level.

Music :

Menu - me

Background music

Scott Buckley - Snowfall
PunchDeck - Opressive Ambience
PunchDeck - What Is and What Could Be
